dublin_core.dcvalue: We present work to develop a wireless wearable sensor system for monitoring patients with Parkinson s disease PD in their homes For monitoring outside the laboratory a wearable system must not only record data but also efficiently process data on board This manuscript details the analysis of data collected using tethered wearable sensors Optimal window length for feature extraction and feature ranking were calculated based on their ability to capture motor fluctuations in persons with PD Results from this study will be employed to develop a software platform for the wireless system to efficiently process on board data
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Analysis of feature space for monitoring persons with Parkinson's disease with application to a wireless wearable sensor system.
